spec_data.Name: rubygem-rdoc
spec_data.License: GPLv2 and Ruby and MIT and SIL
spec_data.Description:
RDoc produces HTML and command-line documentation for Ruby projects.  RDoc
includes the +rdoc+ and +ri+ tools for generating and displaying documentation
from the command-line.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 26 Jul 2017 12:51:25 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: RDoc produces HTML and command-line documentation for Ruby projects
